welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hyde Park, where the city's charm and historic landmarks await you. Known for its beautiful parks and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Orange County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more personalized and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
